DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Positive Finding Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to ask if the extent of the pathologic spread of prostate cancer (pT2) indicates, whether the disease is confined to the prostate on pathologic evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Positive Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)_Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)_The result of an examination or inquiry.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pT2 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer confined to the prostate gland. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI):The result of an examination or inquiry.

Concepts.definition: Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)
The result of an examination or inquiry.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, or Unknown to represent a condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
